name: Grauzone Festival

config_properties.name: Grauzone Festival
config_properties.description: A post-punk and darkwave festival in The Hague, Netherlands, featuring underground and alternative artists.

ai_profile:
**Grauzone Festival 2026: A Celebration of Alternative Sounds and Cultures**  

Grauzone Festival 2026 brings together 70 artists to celebrate a rich spectrum of alternative music, spanning genres such as darkwave, post-punk, electronic, techno, and synthpop. Notably, darkwave takes center stage with the highest representation, alongside a strong showing from post-punk and electronic acts, reflecting the festival’s commitment to its underground roots. The lineup also boasts a diverse mix of emerging and established artists, exploring everything from industrial and shoegaze to experimental and world music, ensuring a multi-dimensional sonic experience.  

This year’s festival highlights its global appeal, featuring performers from 17 countries. France, the USA, and the Netherlands dominate the roster, while artists from Japan, Morocco, Turkey, and Serbia add an exciting international flavor. The festival also showcases diversity in gender representation, with male, female, non-binary, and mixed-gender acts sharing the stage. Furthermore, Grauzone 2026 continues to uplift underrepresented voices, with people of color making up a notable share of the lineup.  

With 11 DJs complementing the live performances, Grauzone Festival 2026 promises a dynamic and inclusive celebration of music and culture. This year’s edition underscores the festival’s ethos of championing diversity and pushing boundaries, making it a must-attend event for fans of alternative and experimental sounds.
